item.description:
Come celebrate the holidays with your fellow Humanist friends!

The dinner this year will include a choice between three entrees:

Chicken and Broccoli
Pan-seared chicken tenderloins in a fresh roasted garlic pecorino wine sauce tossed over penne pasta

Grilled Salmon Filet
Grilled salmon cooked to perfection placed over mashed potatoes, finished with our tomato basil vinaigrette. or a lemon dill cream sauce

Eggplant Parmigiana
Roasled eggplant with a light batter served with a choice of penne or angel hair pasta & finished with a three-cheese melt over marinara sauces

We will be holding a raffle again this year, so if you have any items that you would like to add to it, please contact us at worcesterhumanists@yahoo.com.  So far we will be raffling off a new Kindle, books, artwork, a couple handmade quilts, as well as homemade biscotti, and we expect the list WILL grow.

Tickets for the dinner are $20 and must be purchased prior to the event. Tickets for the raffle will be sold at the event and you will have to be present to win.

We'd like to get your RSVP in by November 30th, so please sign up as soon as you can!  You purchase a ticket from Don at the November 13th meeting.  Linda Miller will also have tickets available if you attend the UU Church services.  Click here to pay online.  Watch this page for more info.

We hope to see you there!
item.name: Annual Non-Denominational Festive Winter Bash
